attributes.action: Force a General Election whenever there is a Major Leadership Change
attributes.additional_details: Our current Conservative leadership has undemocratically elected Boris Johnson to be our PM when the majority of the UK feel that he is not fit to be Prime Minister.
attributes.background:
The people of Great Britain have very little input on who gets to be the leader of a major political party. 

Whenever there is a major party leadership change that results in a new PM, that person must immediately call a general election so that the people of Great Britain can be heard.
